- **RIGHT:** Heads toward edge (x=11), limiting future rightward movement. Remote from nearest apples (e.g., (4,10/11)).

By continuing vertical growth, subsequent moves can pivot leftward to pursue apples like (6,4) or (4,10) while reducing exposure to enemies.
